channel.title: CVE Feed for DataDog -- dd-trace-cpp
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DataDog -- dd-trace-cpp

item.title: CVE-2024-38525|2024-08-02T04:12:25.118Z -- datadog -- dd-trace-cpp
item.description: dd-trace-cpp is the Datadog distributed tracing for C++. When the library fails to extract trace context due to malformed unicode, it logs the list of audited headers and their values using the `nlohmann` JSON library. However, due to the way the JSON library is invoked, it throws an uncaught exception, which results in a crash. This vulnerability has been patched in version 0.2.2.
